name: SCP: Nemesi
description:
ADD TO YOUR WISHLIST!



Important Note: This game is in Very Early Access, positioned between the Alpha and Beta phases. Please treat it with the appropriate consideration.
Approach it with respect, read carefully, and understand before offering your review.

Additionally, please bear in mind that since the game has just been released, the initial player count may be low.
We highly recommend joining our Discord server to find people you can play with.



Overview
SCP: Nemesi is an intense multiplayer survival-horror game that offers a thrilling experience for fans of the SCP Foundation universe and for newcomers too! In this game, players are divided into two groups: one player takes on the role of a powerful anomalous creature, the SCP, while the other four players become Humans, each with their own objectives and branching tasks to complete.

Immersive First-Person View
Experience the chilling atmosphere through a first-person view, whether you are playing as the SCP or the Humans. The immersive perspective enhances the tension and keeps you engaged in the heart-pounding gameplay.

Strategic Human Gameplay
As a Human, you have no means of combat, leaving you vulnerable and exposed. Your survival depends on mastering the map and utilizing your surroundings to your advantage. With superior mobility, including vaulting, sliding, and crouching to minimize noise, stealth and cunning are your greatest allies.

Key Features


  • Did you see that?! - The Humans' visibility is severely limited by a thick fog, making it difficult to see far ahead. Blinking at regular intervals may cause them to miss something crucial...
  • Every man for himself! - Each Human has a unique set of tasks to complete before they can escape. There's no need to rely on teammates to achieve these objectives, and only when a player accomplishes all their tasks can they make their escape.
  • This place seems familiar... - Explore maps inspired by everyday locations from various eras around the Earth. These meticulously designed non-procedural maps feature intricate pathways and hidden passages, challenging players to learn layouts and navigate effectively, which is crucial to their success.
  • Something old, something new - Each SCP featured in the game closely adheres to the SCP Lore, both in appearance and abilities. To set this game apart from other SCP titles, both lesser-known SCPs and intriguing original creations will be featured as the game evolves!
  • It's dangerous out there! - Prepare for the unexpected with the presence of Environmental SCPs, AI-controlled entities that introduce unique challenges during each match. Be warned! While some are friendly, others may not be...
